remarks: Real closure of a derivative.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
statement:
dvmptrecl.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ RR ) $.
dvmptrecl.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> A e. RR ) $.
dvmptrecl.v $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptrecl.b $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D ( x e. S |-> A ) ) = ( x e. S |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptrecl $p |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> B e. RR ) $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
